entry.title: Christmas Cushion Covers - CC04
entry.summary:
Vendor: Design Blanks
Type:
Price: 5.50

These are polyester cushion covers. They come in Christmas or winter themed designs. They can be personalized.

This is only a cover and the cushion insert is not included. 

Each cushion measures approx 45*45 cm. They have a zipper on one side. The back of the cushion is blank.

We recommend using a sheet of teflon, parchment paper or pressing pillow inside all of our polyester cushions when pressing/ironing to prevent the inside from fusing to itself.

entry.title: Buffalo Plaid Cushion Cover - WHITE
entry.summary:
Vendor: Design Blanks
Type:
Price: 6.50

These cushion covers make a beautiful addition to the home.

These are thinner than our premium buffalo plaid cushion covers. They have a zipper opening.   

All square cushion cover approx 16x16inches or 40.5 x 40.5 cm. 100% polyester

entry.title: Bunny Ear Cushion Covers 4 Colours
entry.summary:
Vendor: Design Blanks
Type:
Price: 12.65

Floppy ears and a pom-pom tail. This snuggly cushion cover will match our bunny ear blankets perfectly! These are very boutique worthy. They have stunning details in the edging and are a beautiful weight. Each has a 2 button closure on the back.

Approx 14 inches x 14 inches 100% acrylic, this may vary a little due to the knit nature. 

Made in China

entry.title: Geo Bear Cushion Cover
entry.summary:
Vendor: Design Blanks
Type:
Price: 6.00

These are polyester cushion covers. They come in a variety of designs. They can be personalized. The backs are blank and the perfect place for personalization. 

This is only a cover and the cushion insert is not included. 

Each cushion measures approx 45*45 cm. They have a zipper on one side. The back of the cushion is blank.

We recommend using a sheet of teflon, parchment paper or pressing pillow inside all of our polyester cushions when pressing/ironing to prevent the inside from fusing to itself.
